author: Ted Byrne
content:
But you used 12mm of glass!!!! Okay, there's the frame problem so it converts to about 18mm - still, what width did you want? 2mm? You own a fish eye? Should anyone? :-) Your Olympus isn't full frame right?

As always, the purity of your palette is so clean... Sometimes I sense you are driven to find a virginal world, or at least show one to us. 

Ted
